content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

Here is the requested function:
```julia
function keep_only_names(words) 
    result = String[] #initialize an empty array of Strings
    for word in words 
        if word[1] == uppercase(word[1]) #check if the first letter of the word is a capitalized one
            push!(result, word) #if it is, add that word to our resultant array
        end 
    end
    return result
end
```
You can use this function like so:

```julia
words = ["dog", "Dog", "cat", "Car"]
filtered_words = keep_only_names(words)
println(filtered_words) #outputs: String["Dog","Car"]
```
